info.name: Connection Status Display Popup at Top - Fx 4+
info.description:
For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This moves the Connection Status Display popup messages to the top of screen on top of web page content. Idea from (bug 629915 - Change status info overlay to display at top of screen on top of content)

Tested on Firefox 4+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Credit for code goes to:

User Rodze on: http://forums.mozillazine.org/

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
info.additionalInfo: It should work without problems, but it may clash with some extensions or other css hacks or userstyles out there.
